author: Unknown
text:
I am looking to collect stories of successful local government program or projects for the Life, Well Run Campaign. These stories will help raise awareness about the value of professional local government management. And they will appear on the Life, Well Run website (www.lifewellrun.org). Just click on the map icon on the homepage to see the stories we currently have.
To have your story included on the Life, Well Run map, please share with us the following:

Identify a recent problem or challenge in your community.
Tell us about the program or project your city implemented to address the problem.
Describe the manager's role in planning and implementing the program or project.
List the specific results of the program or project.

Share your stories here or email me at kstrigaro@icma.org
Thanks,
Keith
title: The Life, Well Run Campaign
